text: Own toilet only shared by members of the household
Own toilet shared with 10-15 people (or less) including other households
Own toilet shared with more than 15 people including other households
Pit latrine without slab / Open pit
Removed by service provider to a treatment plant
Emptied by household buried in a covered pit
Removed by service provider to don't know where
Removed by service provider to buried pit
Emptied by household to uncovered pit, open ground, water body or elsewhere
Toilet is not always safe for all household members to use
Limited mobility prevents members from using the toilet
Distance/barriers prevent members from reaching the toilet
Toilet is not always available to all household members
